alternativeNames: Soó, Károly Rezső; Soó, Rudolf v.
notes: Rudolf is the German equivalent of the Hungarian Rezső [Name cited as Rudolf v. Soó in: Ann. Hist.-Nat. Mus. Natl. Hung. 26: 339. 1929]
source: Letter from M. Bassler 20 July 1981.  B.S. Parris' fern index. Obit. in Bot. Közlem., 67(3): 161-165 (1980, publ. 1981), in Hungarian, incl. portr.
